p: All animal experiments conformed to protocols approved by the International Vaccine Institute Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC PN 2015-008, 15 July 2015). Female Balb/c mice aged 6â€“8 weeks were purchased from Orient Bio Inc. (Orient Inc., Gyeonggi-do, Korea). Animals were housed in pathogen-free barrier facilities with a 12-h dark and light cycle and free access to water and food.
